reporting-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

title.narrative: LNG Supply and Natural Gas Infrastructure Reverse Trade Mission Series

description.narrative: Ensure that natural resources are managed in ways that sustain productivity, economic growth and healthy people and ecosystems. Activities include natural resource governance, resource based enterprises, and integrated water resource management. Program in this element should be integrated with the Climate Change, Biodiversity and Agriculture Areas and Elements under the Economic Growth Category.

This award strives to ensure that natural resources are managed in ways that sustain productivity, economic growth and healthy people and ecosystems. Activities include natural resource governance, resource based enterprises, and integrated water resource management. Program in this element should be integrated with the Climate Change, Biodiversity and Agriculture Areas and Elements under the Economic Growth Category. More specifically, this includes This contract funds a reverse trade mission series for two separate and distinct reverse trade missions to introduce delegates from the government and private sectors in Thailand and Vietnam to U.S. technology, regulations and best practices in the gas infrastructure and liquefied natural gas import industries. The delegates will travel to three cities in the United States in order to meet with U.S. companies and conduct site visits to see American technology manufactured and in use..
